page.title: 03SCHOOLS - STRANRAER
page.content: There are {4}Primary schools and {1} 6th. Year Secondary Comprehensive in our area. (Roll of the schools,1985 figures are given in brackets.) a){Primary Schools.} Belmont (193) Park (346) Rephad (246) St. Joseph's R.C. (96) b){Secondary School. Stranraer Academy (1587) is the only Secondary school in the district. It has 14 'feeder' primary schools, nine from outlying rural villages. Children with {Special Educational {Needs}are integrated into Rephad Primary and there is a special unit in Stranraer Academy. An outcentre of {Dumfries College} will be opened soon in Stranraer, using existing buildings,to provide some further education facilities.
